name: 3XVISION_FULLWAVE © RAW-X DIGITAL MURAL
description:
IMPORTANT: SCROLL LEFT/RIGHT < > FOR FULL VIEW | (Massive) 26362px by 3000px Digital Mural. The 1st 5 Collectors (Non-Pizzaboy Club Members) will get a free © Presidential Key 🔑 (Lifetime Membership). The idea for this sequence is to bridge the 60’s hippie soul, specifically those trippy flocked blacklight posters to the modern interconnected weird age. Hopefully the digital screen makers will catch up soon and we can physically display these lysergic bad boys, preferably in retro-futuristic neo-neo-hippie hookah lounge rooms. 

Inspired by: 
Y2K Technology, Napster Sound Waves, Tecate Tall Cans, Melt Web Surfing, Black Opal Visual Stimulation, Beach Bum Mentality, Seafood Acid, Miami Bass Heat, 400 Degreez Scuba Diving, Holographic Jet Skis, The Atlantic Ocean, Alien Communication Systems, Daytona Hot Flamingo Sports Cars, Burner Phones
